verses.kjv: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
verses.ct: The LORD spoke to Moses and said,

verses.kjv: Speak unto the children of Israel, saying, If a soul shall sin through ignorance against any of the commandments of the LORD concerning things which ought not to be done, and shall do against any of them:
verses.ct: "Tell the Israelites: When someone sins unintentionally by violating any of the LORD's commands about things that must not be done,

verses.kjv: If the priest that is anointed do sin according to the sin of the people; then let him bring for his sin, which he hath sinned, a young bullock without blemish unto the LORD for a sin offering.
verses.ct: if it is the anointed priest who sins and brings guilt on the people, he must present a young bull with no defects to the LORD as a sin offering for the sin he committed.

verses.kjv: And he shall bring the bullock unto the door of the tabernacle of the congregation before the LORD; and shall lay his hand upon the bullock’s head, and kill the bullock before the LORD.
verses.ct: He must bring the bull to the entrance of the tent of meeting, into the LORD's presence. He must place his hand on the bull's head and slaughter it there in the LORD's presence.

verses.kjv: And the priest that is anointed shall take of the bullock’s blood, and bring it to the tabernacle of the congregation:
verses.ct: Then the anointed priest must collect some of the bull's blood and carry it into the tent of meeting.

verses.kjv: And the priest shall dip his finger in the blood, and sprinkle of the blood seven times before the LORD, before the vail of the sanctuary.
verses.ct: The priest must dip his finger in the blood and sprinkle it 7 times in the LORD's presence, in front of the curtain of the sanctuary.

verses.kjv: And the priest shall put some of the blood upon the horns of the altar of sweet incense before the LORD, which is in the tabernacle of the congregation; and shall pour all the blood of the bullock at the bottom of the altar of the burnt offering, which is at the door of the tabernacle of the congregation.
verses.ct: The priest must also apply some of the blood to the horns of the fragrant incense altar that stands in the LORD's presence inside the tent of meeting. Then he must pour out the rest of the bull's blood at the base of the burnt offering altar, which stands at the entrance of the tent of meeting.

verses.kjv: And he shall take off from it all the fat of the bullock for the sin offering; the fat that covereth the inwards, and all the fat that is upon the inwards,
verses.ct: He must remove all the fat from the bull of the sin offering — the fat covering the internal organs and all the fat connected to them,

verses.kjv: And the two kidneys, and the fat that is upon them, which is by the flanks, and the caul above the liver, with the kidneys, it shall he take away,
verses.ct: along with both kidneys and the fat on them near the loins, and the lobe of the liver, which he must remove together with the kidneys.

verses.kjv: As it was taken off from the bullock of the sacrifice of peace offerings: and the priest shall burn them upon the altar of the burnt offering.
verses.ct: These parts must be removed just as they are from the bull of the peace offerings. Then the priest must burn them on the burnt offering altar.

verses.kjv: And the skin of the bullock, and all his flesh, with his head, and with his legs, and his inwards, and his dung,
verses.ct: But the bull's hide, all its meat, its head, its legs, its internal organs, and its waste —

verses.kjv: Even the whole bullock shall he carry forth without the camp unto a clean place, where the ashes are poured out, and burn him on the wood with fire: where the ashes are poured out shall he be burnt.
verses.ct: the entire rest of the bull — he must take outside the camp to a ceremonially clean location where ashes are dumped, and burn it on a wood fire. It must be burned at the ash dump.

verses.kjv: And if the whole congregation of Israel sin through ignorance, and the thing be hid from the eyes of the assembly, and they have done somewhat against any of the commandments of the LORD concerning things which should not be done, and are guilty;
verses.ct: If the entire Israelite community sins unintentionally, and the matter escapes the assembly's notice, and they violate any of the LORD's commands about things that must not be done, making themselves guilty,

verses.kjv: When the sin, which they have sinned against it, is known, then the congregation shall offer a young bullock for the sin, and bring him before the tabernacle of the congregation.
verses.ct: once the sin they committed becomes known, the assembly must present a young bull as a sin offering and bring it to the front of the tent of meeting.

verses.kjv: And the elders of the congregation shall lay their hands upon the head of the bullock before the LORD: and the bullock shall be killed before the LORD.
verses.ct: The elders of the community must place their hands on the bull's head in the LORD's presence, and the bull must be slaughtered there in the LORD's presence.

verses.kjv: And the priest that is anointed shall bring of the bullock’s blood to the tabernacle of the congregation:
verses.ct: Then the anointed priest must bring some of the bull's blood into the tent of meeting.

verses.kjv: And the priest shall dip his finger in some of the blood, and sprinkle it seven times before the LORD, even before the vail.
verses.ct: The priest must dip his finger in the blood and sprinkle it 7 times in the LORD's presence, in front of the curtain.

verses.kjv: And he shall put some of the blood upon the horns of the altar which is before the LORD, that is in the tabernacle of the congregation, and shall pour out all the blood at the bottom of the altar of the burnt offering, which is at the door of the tabernacle of the congregation.
verses.ct: He must apply some of the blood to the horns of the altar that stands in the LORD's presence inside the tent of meeting, and pour out the rest of the blood at the base of the burnt offering altar at the entrance of the tent of meeting.

verses.kjv: And he shall take all his fat from him, and burn it upon the altar.
verses.ct: He must remove all the fat from the bull and burn it on the altar.

verses.kjv: And he shall do with the bullock as he did with the bullock for a sin offering, so shall he do with this: and the priest shall make an atonement for them, and it shall be forgiven them.
verses.ct: He must handle this bull exactly the same way he handled the bull for the priest's sin offering. In this way the priest will make atonement for them, and they will be forgiven.

verses.kjv: And he shall carry forth the bullock without the camp, and burn him as he burned the first bullock: it is a sin offering for the congregation.
verses.ct: Then he must take the bull outside the camp and burn it just as he burned the first bull. This is the sin offering for the entire community.

verses.kjv: When a ruler hath sinned, and done somewhat through ignorance against any of the commandments of the LORD his God concerning things which should not be done, and is guilty;
verses.ct: When a leader sins by unintentionally violating any of the commands of the LORD his God about things that must not be done, making himself guilty,

verses.kjv: Or if his sin, wherein he hath sinned, come to his knowledge; he shall bring his offering, a kid of the goats, a male without blemish:
verses.ct: or when the sin he committed is brought to his attention, he must bring as his offering a male goat with no defects.

verses.kjv: And he shall lay his hand upon the head of the goat, and kill it in the place where they kill the burnt offering before the LORD: it is a sin offering.
verses.ct: He must place his hand on the goat's head and slaughter it at the spot where burnt offerings are killed in the LORD's presence. This is a sin offering.

verses.kjv: And the priest shall take of the blood of the sin offering with his finger, and put it upon the horns of the altar of burnt offering, and shall pour out his blood at the bottom of the altar of burnt offering.
verses.ct: The priest must take some of the blood from the sin offering with his finger and apply it to the horns of the burnt offering altar, then pour out the rest of the blood at the base of that altar.

verses.kjv: And he shall burn all his fat upon the altar, as the fat of the sacrifice of peace offerings: and the priest shall make an atonement for him as concerning his sin, and it shall be forgiven him.
verses.ct: He must burn all the fat on the altar, just like the fat from peace offerings. In this way the priest will make atonement for the leader's sin, and he will be forgiven.

verses.kjv: And if any one of the common people sin through ignorance, while he doeth somewhat against any of the commandments of the LORD concerning things which ought not to be done, and be guilty;
verses.ct: If an ordinary person sins unintentionally by violating any of the LORD's commands about things that must not be done, making themselves guilty,

verses.kjv: Or if his sin, which he hath sinned, come to his knowledge: then he shall bring his offering, a kid of the goats, a female without blemish, for his sin which he hath sinned.
verses.ct: or when the sin they committed is brought to their attention, they must bring as their offering a female goat with no defects for the sin they committed.

verses.kjv: And he shall lay his hand upon the head of the sin offering, and slay the sin offering in the place of the burnt offering.
verses.ct: They must place their hand on the head of the sin offering and kill it at the location where burnt offerings are slaughtered.

verses.kjv: And the priest shall take of the blood thereof with his finger, and put it upon the horns of the altar of burnt offering, and shall pour out all the blood thereof at the bottom of the altar.
verses.ct: The priest must take some of its blood with his finger and apply it to the horns of the burnt offering altar, then pour out the rest of the blood at the base of the altar.

verses.kjv: And he shall take away all the fat thereof, as the fat is taken away from off the sacrifice of peace offerings; and the priest shall burn it upon the altar for a sweet savour unto the LORD; and the priest shall make an atonement for him, and it shall be forgiven him.
verses.ct: He must remove all the fat, just as fat is removed from peace offerings, and the priest must burn it on the altar as a pleasing aroma to the LORD. In this way the priest will make atonement for that person, and they will be forgiven.

verses.kjv: And if he bring a lamb for a sin offering, he shall bring it a female without blemish.
verses.ct: If the person brings a lamb as a sin offering, it must be a female with no defects.

verses.kjv: And he shall lay his hand upon the head of the sin offering, and slay it for a sin offering in the place where they kill the burnt offering.
verses.ct: They must place their hand on the head of the sin offering and kill it as a sin offering at the location where burnt offerings are slaughtered.

verses.kjv: And the priest shall take of the blood of the sin offering with his finger, and put it upon the horns of the altar of burnt offering, and shall pour out all the blood thereof at the bottom of the altar:
verses.ct: The priest must take some of the blood from the sin offering with his finger and apply it to the horns of the burnt offering altar, then pour out the rest of the blood at the base of the altar.

verses.kjv: And he shall take away all the fat thereof, as the fat of the lamb is taken away from the sacrifice of the peace offerings; and the priest shall burn them upon the altar, according to the offerings made by fire unto the LORD: and the priest shall make an atonement for his sin that he hath committed, and it shall be forgiven him.
verses.ct: He must remove all the fat, just as the fat of a lamb is removed from peace offerings, and the priest must burn these portions on the altar along with the fire offerings to the LORD. In this way the priest will make atonement for the sin that person committed, and they will be forgiven.
